uvi.description:
usb: dwc3: ep0: fix NULL pointer exception

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.12.11 by commit 788755756dd4a6aba1de479fec20b0fa600e7f19. For more details please see the references link.
